name: Shoot Force
description:
Platformer without keyboard controlls! Use your mouse to aim your gun and move with recoil! Get the key to open the door, and proceed to the next level. This game has 10 levels total.  Can you complete them all in under 1 minute?)

Made for #gmtkjam2018 in 1 day.

If you have performance issues in web version, try downloading standalone version!
